description:
Things don`t look good for the prettiest Straw Hat. Nami`s about to tangle with a thorny adversary, and the weapon Usopp built her is only good for party tricks!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Avis de tempête ! Le bâton climatique de Nami !
Il bastone Klimattack, l`arma speciale di Nami
Nami no Senpuu Chuuihou! Clima Takt Sakuretsu
Nami`s Cyclone Advisory! Clima Tact Burst!
Нами предупреждает об урагане! Взрыв погодного посоха
ระวังลมหมุนของนามิให้ดี..ระเบิดกระบองคุริมะ
ナミの旋風注意報! クリマタクト炸裂
